definition: to make an appointment/to invite/approximately/pact/treaty/to economize/to restrict/to reduce (a fraction)/concise
to weigh in a balance or on a scale
dawn/morning/daybreak/day/dan, female roles in Chinese opera (traditionally played by specialized male actors)

sentences.english: Soon, Naaman drove his chariot to the Jordan and followed my command of dipping in the water seven times.
sentences.chinese: 我命令他“在约旦河沐浴七次”。

sentences.english: Joshua therefore commanded the priests, saying, Come ye up out of Jordan.
sentences.chinese: 你吩咐抬法柜的祭司从约旦河里上来。

sentences.english: The same is true in the West Bank and the Islamic world.
sentences.chinese: 约旦河西岸地区乃至整个伊斯兰世界也是如此。

sentences.english: This is the difference. The Sea of Galilee receives but does not keep the Jordan.
sentences.chinese: 加利利海接纳约旦河水但并不守着河一滴不放。

sentences.english: Then cometh Yeshua from Galilee to Jordan unto John, to be baptized of him.
sentences.chinese: 耶斯华从加利利来到约旦河找约翰，受他的洗。

sentences.english: And Judah came to Gilgal, to go to meet the king, to conduct the king over Jordan.
sentences.chinese: 犹大人来到吉甲，要去迎接王，请他过约旦河。

sentences.english: Then Moses severed three cities on this side Jordan toward the sunrising;
sentences.chinese: 那时，摩西在约旦河东，向日出之地，分定三座城。

sentences.english: The boundary of the Reubenites was the bank of the Jordan.
sentences.chinese: 流便人的境界就是约旦河与靠近约旦河的地。

sentences.english: The boundary of the Reubenites was the bank of the Jordan.
sentences.chinese: 流便人的境界就是约旦河与靠近约旦河的地。

sentences.english: I brought you to the land of the Amorites who lived east of the Jordan.
sentences.chinese: 我领你们到约旦河东亚摩利人所住之地。

sentences.english: He attracted much public notice c. AD 28 as a prophet in the Jordan Valley.
sentences.chinese: 大约西元28年成为约旦河谷闻名的先知。

sentences.english: Some Hebrews even crossed the Jordan to the land of Gad and Gilead.
sentences.chinese: 有些希伯来人过了约旦河，逃到迦得和基列地。

sentences.english: But first, Joshua sent two spies across the Jordan.
sentences.chinese: 约书亚先派了两个探子过约旦河。

sentences.english: And were baptized of him in Jordan, confessing their sins.
sentences.chinese: 承认他们的罪，在约旦河里受他的洗。

sentences.english: Fayyad wants most of the money funneled through his West Bank-based government.
sentences.chinese: 法耶玆希望多数的资金能通过约旦河西岸政府流入。

sentences.english: I battled terrorists along both banks of the Jordan River.
sentences.chinese: 我沿着约旦河两岸与恐怖分子战斗。

definition: variant of 約旦河|约旦河[Yue1 dan4 He2]
Philistine (Palestinian people, reputedly uncircumcised, c. 1,000 BC)
Gideon (name, from Judges 6:11-ffoll.)/also written 吉迪恩
